IOS Installation

Switch

Connect

  1. Connect to the device via serial console1):

    $ cu -l </dev/ttyUSB0> -s <9600>
switch:>

  2. Try to boot (it should fail):

    switch:> boot
Loading "flash:/c3560-ipbase-mz.122-50.SE5/c3560-ipbase-mz.122-50.SE5.bin"...flash:/c3560-ipbase-mz.122-50.SE5/c3560-ipbase-mz.122-50.SE5.bin: invalid argument

Error loading "flash:/c3560-ipbase-mz.122-50.SE5/c3560-ipbase-mz.122-50.SE5.bin"

Interrupt within 5 seconds to abort boot process.
Boot process failed...

  3. Find switch version:

    switch:> version
C3560 Boot Loader (C3560-HBOOT-M) Version 12.2(44)SE5, RELEASE SOFTWARE (fc1)
Compiled Wed 07-Jan-09 15:55 by gereddy

  4. Find software for right device: https://software.cisco.com/download/find.
1)
Linux serial devices: https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/307390/what-is-the-difference-between-ttys0-ttyusb0-and-ttyama0-in-linux
